trans-unit.source: Defining a few Supervisors to be “permanent peers” will provide a robust network, but unless done with care, it can be less than ideal. We recommend running a small number of Supervisors as permanent peers, but to run no services on those Supervisors. In modern dynamic architectures, it’s common for nodes to come and go; VMs may get shut down, containers can be rescheduled, and so on. If you were to go to the extreme and have all your Supervisors be permanent peers, you would end up with unnecessary network traffic as the Supervisors come and go as the infrastructure evolves across time. Each Supervisor would try to maintain contact with every Supervisor that had ever been a member of the network!
trans-unit.target: 将几个主管定义为“永久对等方”将提供一个强大的网络，但是除非谨慎进行，否则它可能不理想。我们建议将少量Supervisor作为永久对等方运行，但不要在这些Supervisor上运行任何服务。在现代动态架构中，节点来来往往是很普遍的。 VM可能会关闭，容器可以重新安排，依此类推。如果您要发挥极端作用并使所有主管成为永久对等方，那么随着基础结构随着时间的推移而不断变化，随着主管的进出，您最终将获得不必要的网络流量。每个主管都将尝试与曾经是该网络成员的每个主管保持联系！

trans-unit.source: Dependencies and Promotion
trans-unit.target: 依赖性和促进

trans-unit.source: Dependencies impact two or more projects. Those projects have their own pipelines up through Acceptance, but when a project’s tests are run in the shared Union, Rehearsal, and Delivered pipeline for the organization, tests for all projects which depend on the currently-tested project will also run as part of the Union stage. This is to ensure that no cross-project bugs were introduced, such as a breaking API change. Also, you should still run smoke and functional tests on a project that depends on other project(s) during the Acceptance stage (because you know what those dependencies are). However, you may not know which projects depend on your project. Chef Automate uses the Union stage to runs tests against projects that depend on your project.
trans-unit.target: 依赖关系影响两个或多个项目。这些项目通过验收拥有自己的管道，但是当在组织的共享联合，排练和交付管道中运行项目的测试时，依赖于当前测试项目的所有项目的测试也将作为项目的一部分运行。联盟舞台。这是为了确保不会引入跨项目的错误，例如重大的API更改。另外，在接受阶段，您仍然应该对依赖于其他项目的项目进行冒烟和功能测试（因为您知道这些依赖关系是什么）。但是，您可能不知道哪些项目取决于您的项目。 Chef Automate使用Union阶段对依赖于您的项目的项目运行测试。

trans-unit.source: Depending on how you’ve set up your nodes, you may need to set up more than one key that uses the same SSH Private Key with different usernames. For example, AWS EC2 Amazon Linux nodes require the username ec2-user, while AWS EC2 Ubuntu nodes require the username ubuntu or root. The Credentials page enables saving two different sets of credentials, both using the same SSH Private Key and different user names. However, credentials with different content may also reuse identical key names; it may be advisable to reduce confusion by follow a naming pattern specifying the key name and platform to distinguish between similar credentials.
trans-unit.target: 根据您设置节点的方式，您可能需要设置多个使用相同SSH私钥和不同用户名的密钥。例如，AWS EC2 Amazon Linux节点需要用户名 ec2-user ，而AWS EC2 Ubuntu节点则需要用户名 ubuntu 或 root 。通过“凭据”页面，可以使用相同的SSH私钥和不同的用户名保存两组不同的凭据。但是，具有不同内容的凭据也可能会重用相同的密钥名称。建议遵循遵循指定密钥名称和平台的命名模式以区分相似证书的方式，以减少混乱。

trans-unit.source: Deploying Chef Automate takes ten minutes for a clean install. At the command prompt, accept the terms of service with a y, The installer then performs a series of pre-flight checks. Any unsuccessful checks offer information for resolving issues or skipping the check. After resolving any pre-flight issues, run the deploy command again.
trans-unit.target: 全新安装Chef Automate会花费十分钟。在命令提示符下，使用 y 接受服务条款，然后安装程序将执行一系列飞行前检查。任何不成功的检查都会提供解决问题或跳过检查的信息。解决所有飞行前问题后，请再次运行deploy命令。

trans-unit.source: Deploying Chef Habitat Builder with Chef Automate requires a Chef Automate license. If you already have a Chef Automate license, you may use it for the deployment. Otherwise, you can accept the 30-day trial license when you first sign in to Chef Automate.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Chef Automate 部署 Chef Habitat Builder 需要一个 Chef Automate 许可证。如果您已经有一个Chef Automate许可证,您可以使用它进行部署。否则,您可以在第一次登录Chef Automate时接受30天的试用许可证。

trans-unit.source: Deprecation warnings are great for ensuring cookbooks are kept up-to-date and to prepare for major version upgrades, sometimes you just can’t fix a deprecation right away. Enabling treat_deprecation_warnings_as_errors mode in Test Kitchen integration tests often compounds the problem because it does not distinguish between deprecations from community cookbooks and those in your own code.

trans-unit.source: Desired State Configuration (DSC) is a feature of Windows PowerShell that provides a set of language extensions, cmdlets, and resources that can be used to declaratively configure software. DSC is similar to Chef, in that both tools are idempotent, take similar approaches to the concept of resources, describe the configuration of a system, and then take the steps required to do that configuration. The most important difference between Chef and DSC is that Chef uses Ruby and DSC is exposed as configuration data from within Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: 所需状态配置（DSC）是Windows PowerShell的一项功能，它提供了一组语言扩展，cmdlet和资源，可用于以声明方式配置软件。DSC与Chef相似，因为这两个工具都是幂等的，对资源的概念采用相似的方法，描述系统的配置，然后采取进行该配置所需的步骤。Chef和DSC之间最重要的区别是Chef使用Ruby，并且DSC作为Windows PowerShell中的配置数据公开。

trans-unit.source: Desired State Configuration (DSC) is a feature of Windows PowerShell that provides a set of language extensions, cmdlets, and resources that can be used to declaratively configure software. DSC is similar to Chef, in that both tools are idempotent, take similar approaches to the concept of resources, describe the configuration of a system, and then take the steps required to do that configuration. The most important difference between Chef and DSC is that Chef uses Ruby and DSC is exposed as configuration data from within Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: 所需状态配置（DSC）是Windows PowerShell的一项功能，它提供了一组语言扩展，cmdlet和资源，可用于以声明方式配置软件。DSC与Chef相似，因为这两个工具都是幂等的，对资源的概念采用相似的方法，描述系统的配置，然后采取进行该配置所需的步骤。Chef和DSC之间最重要的区别是Chef使用Ruby，并且DSC作为Windows PowerShell中的配置数据公开。

trans-unit.source: Determines if a particular TCP/IP port is reachable. allow_in and allow_out examine whether the specified port is included in the port range of a rule, while allow_in. You may specify the port as a string ('22') or as a number.
trans-unit.target: 确定特定的TCP / IP端口是否可访问。 allow_in 和 allow_out 会检查指定端口是否包含在规则的端口范围内，而 allow_in 会检查。您可以将端口指定为字符串（ '22' ）或数字。

trans-unit.source: Determines if a rule exists whose port range begins at the specified number. The word from_ does not relate to inbound/outbound directionality; it relates to the port range (“counting from"). from_port is an exact criterion; so if the rule allows 1000-2000 and you specify a from_port of 1001, it does not match.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否存在规则的端口范围以指定的数字开头。字 from_ 并没有涉及到呼入/呼出的方向性; 它与端口范围有关（“从”开始计数”） from_port 是一个精确的条件；因此，如果规则允许1000-2000，并且您将 from_port 指定为1001，则该端口不匹配。

trans-unit.source: Determines if a rule exists whose port range ends at the specified number. The word to_ does not relate to inbound/outbound directionality; it relates to the port range (“counting to"). to_port is an exact criterion; so if the rule allows 1000-2000 and you specify a to_port of 1999, it does not match.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否存在规则的端口范围以指定的数字结尾。字 to_ 并没有涉及到呼入/呼出的方向性; 它与端口范围相关（“计数为”） to_port 是一个精确的条件；因此，如果规则允许1000-2000，并且您将 to_port 指定为1999，则该值不匹配。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the script will run with elevated permissions to circumvent User Access Control (UAC) from interactively blocking the process. This will cause the process to be run under a batch login instead of an interactive login. The user running chef-client needs the ‘Replace a process level token’ and ‘Adjust Memory Quotas for a process’ permissions. The user that is running the command needs the ‘Log on as a batch job’ permission. Because this requires a login, the user and password properties are required.
trans-unit.target: 确定脚本是否将以提升的权限运行，以规避用户访问控制（UAC）交互地阻止进程。这将导致该过程在批处理登录而不是交互式登录下运行。运行Chef-Client的用户需要“替换进程级别令牌”和“为进程调整内存配额”权限。运行命令的用户需要“作为批处理作业登录”权限。因为这需要登录，所以用户和密码属性是必需的。

trans-unit.source: Disagreements are inherent to a group of impassioned people. When they occur, we seek to resolve disagreements and differing views constructively and with the help of the community and community processes. When disagreements escalate, we ask our Community Advocates to step in to moderate, mediate, and help resolve tense situations.
trans-unit.target: 分歧是一群充满激情的人所固有的。当分歧发生时,我们寻求在社区和社区程序的帮助下建设性地解决分歧和不同意见。当分歧升级时,我们请我们的社区倡导者出面调停、调解,帮助解决紧张的局面。

trans-unit.source: Disagreements happen, but should not be an excuse for poor behavior and bad manners. When disagreements do happen, let’s work together to solve them effectively and in a way that ensures that everyone understands what the disagreements were.
trans-unit.target: 发生分歧，但不应成为不良行为和不良举止的借口。当确实发生分歧时，让我们共同努力，以确保每个人都了解分歧是什么的方式有效地解决它们。

trans-unit.source: Disaster Recovery for Chef Automate pertains to the workflow capabilities only. Also, these instructions assume that the primary and standby servers are in the same data center. If they are in different geographical locations additional considerations are necessary, as well as tuning the configuration to account for latency between data centers.
trans-unit.target: Chef Automate 的灾难恢复只与工作流功能有关。此外,这些说明假设主服务器和备用服务器在同一个数据中心。如果它们在不同的地理位置,则需要额外的考虑,以及调整配置以考虑数据中心之间的延迟。

trans-unit.source: Do call the command to execute with exec <command> <options> rather than running the command directly in a Linux targeted hook. This ensures the command is executed in the same process and that the service will restart correctly on configuration changes.

trans-unit.source: Do not attempt to upgrade individual components of the Chef package. Due to the way Chef packages are built, modifying any of the individual components in the package will lead to cluster instability. If the latest version of the backend cluster is providing an out-of-date package, please bring it to the attention of Chef by filling out a ticket with support@chef.io.
trans-unit.target: 不要尝试升级Chef软件包的各个组件。由于Chef软件包的构建方式，修改软件包中的任何单个组件都将导致群集不稳定。如果最新版本的后端集群提供的软件包过时，请通过support@chef.io填写故障单，以引起Chef的注意。

trans-unit.source: Don’t call hab or sleep in a hook that is not the run hook. You can only block the thread in a hook if it is in the run hook.

trans-unit.source: Don’t call any functions or helper sthat begin with an underscore, for example _dont_call_this_function(). Those are internal for internal builder functions and are not supported for external use. They will break your plan if you call them.

trans-unit.source: Due to the current logic around package installation, there is an extra step needed if you would like to have your containerized Supervisors update either themselves or the services they supervise. When installing packages as a non-root user, Chef Habitat will download the origin keys and compressed hart files into the user’s ${HOME}/.hab directory, rather than the global /hab/cache directory. You will need to ensure that a user-writable directory is mounted into the container, and specify it as the user’s home directory using the HOME environment variable. Using pure Docker with a volume that is accessible by the user, that might look like this:
trans-unit.target: 由于当前围绕软件包安装的逻辑，如果您想让容器化的Supervisor自己更新或更新他们所监督的服务，则需要执行额外的步骤。当以非root用户身份安装软件包时，Chef Habitat将把源密钥和压缩的hart文件下载到用户的 ${HOME}/.hab 目录中，而不是全局 /hab/cache 目录中。您将需要确保将用户可写目录安装到容器中，并使用 HOME 环境变量将其指定为用户的主目录。将纯Docker与用户可访问的卷一起使用，可能看起来像这样：

trans-unit.source: Due to the impact of COVID-19, Chef’s employees cannot access our physical data center, which is a requirement for Solaris support. Until we can physically access the data center, Solaris builds on Chef Infra Client 16 will not be supported. They are available on Chef Infra Client 15, and we will begin building for Chef Infra Client 16 as soon as we responsibly can.
trans-unit.target: 由于COVID-19的影响，Chef的员工无法访问我们的物理数据中心，这是Solaris支持的要求。在我们无法物理访问数据中心之前，将不支持在Chef Infra Client 16上构建的Solaris。它们在Chef Infra Client 15上可用，我们将尽我们所能尽快开始为Chef Infra Client 16进行构建。

trans-unit.source: During a Chef Infra Client run, the checksum for each local file is calculated and then compared against the checksum for the same file as it currently exists in the cookbook on the Chef Infra Server. A file is not transferred when the checksums match. Only files that require an update are transferred from the Chef Infra Server to a node.
trans-unit.target: 在Chef Infra Client运行期间,计算每个本地文件的校验和,然后与Chef Infra服务器上cookbook中当前存在的同一文件的校验和进行比较。当校验和匹配时,文件不会被传输。只有需要更新的文件才会从Chef Infra服务器传输到节点。

trans-unit.source: During a chef-client Run
trans-unit.target: 在厨师客户端运行期间

trans-unit.source: During a chef-client run, the checksum for each local file is calculated and then compared against the checksum for the same file as it currently exists in the cookbook on the Chef server. A file is not transferred when the checksums match. Only files that require an update are transferred from the Chef server to a node.
trans-unit.target: 在 chef 客户端运行过程中,计算每个本地文件的校验和,然后与 chef 服务器上食谱中当前存在的同一文件的校验和进行比较。当校验和匹配时,文件不会被传输。只有需要更新的文件才会从Chef服务器传输到节点。

trans-unit.source: During the cloud-api bootstrap operation, knife does not print the output of a Chef Infra Client run like it does when the winrm and ssh options are used. knife reports only on the status of the bootstrap process: provisioning, installing, ready, and so on, along with reporting errors.
trans-unit.target: 在 cloud-api 引导操作期间，刀具不会像使用 winrm 和 ssh 选项时一样打印Chef Infra Client运行的输出。刀具仅报告引导过程的状态： provisioning ， installing ， ready 等，并报告错误。

trans-unit.source: During the Acceptance stage, infrastructure is provisioned (if needed), and the artifacts published at the end of the Build stage are deployed. The deployment is verified with automated smoke tests, and then the health of the resulting system is verified by running a functional test suite. At this point, the pipeline pauses and waits for explicit approval from someone who has the “shipper” role. The Acceptance stage is where you can run ad-hoc tests, and perform manual user acceptance testing. For the internal use of Chef Automate at Chef, we have our product owners review changes in Acceptance and decide whether or not to select the Deliver button.
trans-unit.target: 在验收阶段，将配置基础结构（如果需要），并部署在构建阶段结束时发布的工件。通过自动烟雾测试对部署进行验证，然后通过运行功能测试套件来验证所得系统的运行状况。此时，管道暂停并等待具有“托运人”角色的人的明确批准。在验收阶段，您可以运行临时测试，并执行手动用户验收测试。对于Chef内部的Chef Automate的内部使用，我们让产品所有者检查验收中的更改并决定是否选择“交付”按钮。

trans-unit.source: During the Acceptance stage, infrastructure is provisioned (if needed), and the artifacts published at the end of the Build stage are deployed. The deployment is verified with automated smoke tests, and then the health of the resulting system is verified by running a functional test suite. At this point, the pipeline pauses and waits for explicit approval from someone who has the “shipper” role. The Acceptance stage is where you can run ad-hoc tests, and perform manual user acceptance testing. For the internal use of Workflow at Chef, we have our product owners review changes in Acceptance and decide whether or not to click the Deliver button.
trans-unit.target: 在验收阶段，将配置基础结构（如果需要），并部署在构建阶段结束时发布的工件。通过自动烟雾测试对部署进行验证，然后通过运行功能测试套件来验证所得系统的运行状况。此时，管道暂停并等待具有“托运人”角色的人的明确批准。在验收阶段，您可以运行临时测试，并执行手动用户验收测试。对于Chef内部工作流的使用，我们让产品负责人查看验收中的更改并决定是否单击“交付”按钮。

trans-unit.source: ETCD_ELECTION_TIMEOUT in milliseconds. This controls how long an etcd node will wait for heartbeat before triggering an election. Per etcd’s documentation, this should be 5 to 10 times larger than the etcd.heartbeat_interval. Increasing etcd.election_timeout increases the time it will take for etcd to detect a failure.
trans-unit.target: ETCD_ELECTION_TIMEOUT（以毫秒为单位）。这控制了etcd节点在触发选举之前将等待心跳的时间。每ETCD的文档，这应该是比较大的5至10倍 etcd.heartbeat_interval 。增加 etcd.election_timeout 会增加 etcd 检测故障所需的时间。

trans-unit.source: ETCD_HEARTBEAT_INTERVAL in milliseconds. This is the frequency at which the leader will send heartbeats to followers. etcd’s documentation recommends that this is set roughly to the round-trip times between members.
trans-unit.target: ETCD_HEARTBEAT_INTERVAL（以毫秒为单位）。这是领导者将心跳发送给关注者的频率。etcd的文档建议将其大致设置为成员之间的往返时间。

trans-unit.source: ETCD_SNAPSHOT_COUNT which is the number of committed transactions to trigger a snapshot to disk.
trans-unit.target: ETCD_SNAPSHOT_COUNT,这是触发磁盘快照的承诺事务数。

trans-unit.source: Each Chef InSpec profile has a metadata file at the top level named inspec.yml. In that file, you may add a section for inputs. You may define inputs there, clearly setting options including values, type checking, and whether the input is required.
trans-unit.target: 每个Chef InSpec配置文件在顶层都有一个名为 inspec.yml 的元数据文件。在该文件中，您可以添加一个用于输入的部分。您可以在此处定义输入，明确设置选项，包括值，类型检查以及是否需要输入。

trans-unit.source: Each Chef server in a high availabilty configuration must have an identical chef-server.rb file that is located in the /etc/opscode/ directory on each server. This file describes the topology of the high availability configuration. On the primary backend server, create a file named chef-server.rb and save it in the /etc/opscode/ directory.
trans-unit.target: 高可用性配置中的每个Chef服务器必须具有一个相同的Chef-server.rb文件，该文件位于每个服务器的 /etc/opscode/ 目录中。该文件描述了高可用性配置的拓扑。在主后端服务器上，创建一个名为Chef-server.rb的文件，并将其保存在 /etc/opscode/ 目录中。

trans-unit.source: Each Supervisor in the system is a census entry that together form a census. Operations to discover or mutate the state of the census happen through algorithms that arrive at the same conclusion given the same inputs.
trans-unit.target: 系统中的每个主管都是一个人口普查条目，它们一起构成了人口普查。在给定相同输入的情况下，通过得出相同结论的算法来发现或改变普查状态的操作。

trans-unit.source: Each Train transport offers a variety of options. By using the credential set facility, you are able to easily set options that are not accessible via the Train URI.

trans-unit.source: Each VPC is uniquely identified by its VPC ID. In addition, each VPC has a non-unique CIDR IP Address range (such as 10.0.0.0/16) which it manages.
trans-unit.target: 每个VPC由其VPC ID唯一标识。此外,每个VPC都有一个非唯一的CIDR IP地址范围(如10.0.0.0/16),由其管理。

trans-unit.source: Each additional Supervisor you add to the network should be peered to at least one of the bastion ring Supervisors. Technically speaking, only one peer is necessary, as that provides access to the rest of the network. However, it could be possible to not fully connect to all of them if, say, the Supervisor joined during a network split event. Out of convention and redundancy, we peer to all the bastion ring Supervisors, like so:
trans-unit.target: 您添加到网络中的每个其他Supervisor都应与堡垒环Supervisor中的至少一个对等。从技术上讲，只需要一个对等点，因为它提供了对网络其余部分的访问。但是，例如，如果Supervisor在网络拆分事件中加入，则可能无法完全连接到所有这些设备。出于惯例和冗余，我们查看所有堡垒环管理程序，如下所示：

trans-unit.target: 显示的每一个属性值都是为该优先级设置的值。

trans-unit.source: Each audit is authored within a recipe using the control_group and control methods that are part of the Recipe DSL. Recipes that contain audits are added to the run-list, after which they can be processed by the chef-client. Output will appear in the same location as the regular chef-client run (as specified by the log_location setting in the client.rb file).
trans-unit.target: 每次审核都在食谱中使用配方DSL一部分的 control_group 和 control 方法编写。包含审核的配方将添加到运行列表中，然后厨师客户可以对其进行处理。输出将出现在与常规Chef-Client运行相同的位置（由client.rb文件中的 log_location 设置指定）。

trans-unit.source: Each authentication request must include /organizations/organization_name/pushy/ as part of the name for the endpoint. For example: /organizations/organization_name/pushy/jobs/ID or /organizations/organization_name/pushy/node_states.
trans-unit.target: 每个身份验证请求都必须包含 /organizations/organization_name/pushy/ 作为端点名称的一部分。例如： /organizations/organization_name/pushy/jobs/ID 或 /organizations/organization_name/pushy/node_states 。

trans-unit.source: Each blueprint may require different parameters to successfully complete provisioning. See your vRA administrator with questions. Knife will attempt to provide any helpful error messages from vRA if they’re available.
trans-unit.target: 每个蓝图可能需要不同的参数才能成功完成预配。如有疑问，请与您的vRA管理员联系。如果可用，刀将尝试从vRA提供任何有用的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: Each cookbook can be configured to contain cookbook-specific copyright, email, and license data which is stored in the metadata.rb file.
trans-unit.target: 每个食谱都可以配置为包含特定于食谱的版权，电子邮件和许可证数据，这些数据存储在metas.rb文件中。

trans-unit.source: Each cookbook has its own .rubocop.yml file, which means that each cookbook may have its own set of enabled, disabled, and custom rules. That said, it’s more common for all cookbooks to have the same set of enabled, disabled, and custom rules. When RuboCop is run against a cookbook, the full set of enabled and disabled rules (as defined the enabled.yml and disabled.yml files in Cookstyle itself) are loaded first, and are then compared against the settings in the cookbook’s .rubocop.yml file.
trans-unit.target: 每个菜谱都有其自己的.rubocop.yml文件，这意味着每个菜谱可能具有其自己的一组启用，禁用和自定义规则。也就是说，所有食谱都具有相同的启用，禁用和自定义规则集。当针对食谱运行RuboCop时，将首先加载全套启用和禁用的规则（如Cookstyle本身中定义的 enabled.yml 和 disabled.yml 文件），然后将其与食谱的.rubocop.yml中的设置进行比较文件。

trans-unit.source: Each cookbook under the /cookbooks directory must have a valid cookbook structure. If the cookbook does not have a metadata.rb or metadata.json file it will not be discovered by the provision.rb recipe; consequently, that cookbook will not be used to configure nodes in the Chef Automate pipeline.
trans-unit.target: /cookbooks 目录下的每个菜谱都必须具有有效的菜谱结构。如果该菜谱没有 metadata.rb 或 metadata.json 文件，那么 provision.rb 配方将不会发现该文件；因此，该食谱将不会用于配置Chef Automate管道中的节点。

trans-unit.source: Each cookbook under the /cookbooks directory must have a valid cookbook structure. Consequently, that cookbook will not be used to configure nodes in the Chef Automate pipeline.

trans-unit.source: Each node stores its private key locally. This private key is generated as part of the bootstrap process that initially installs Chef Infra Client on the node. The first time Chef Infra Client runs on that node, it uses the chef-validator to authenticate, but then on each subsequent run it uses the private key generated for that client by the Chef Infra Server.
trans-unit.target: 每个节点在本地存储其私钥。这个私钥是作为最初在节点上安装Chef Infra Client的引导过程的一部分生成的。第一次Chef Infra Client在该节点上运行时,它使用chef-validator来验证,但在随后的每次运行中,它使用Chef Infra服务器为该客户端生成的私钥。

Below is the TOML front matter for this page which you can use as a reference. Contact the Docs Team if you have any questions about properly formatting TOML front matter.

trans-unit.source: Each plan can specify lifecycle event handlers, or hooks, to perform certain actions during a service’s runtime. Each hook is a script with a shebang defined at the top to specify the interpreter to be used. On Windows, Powershell Core is the only interpreter ever used.
trans-unit.target: 每个计划都可以指定生命周期事件处理程序或挂钩，以在服务的运行时执行某些操作。每个钩子都是一个脚本，在顶部定义了一个shebang，以指定要使用的解释器。在Windows上，Powershell Core是唯一使用过的解释器。

trans-unit.source: Each project contains a configuration file in its source repository, located at .delivery/config.json, that specifies the build cookbook to use for the project, and in turn, the build cookbook contains recipes that control what happens in the pipeline phases. The config file also allows customization of the behavior of Chef Automate and the build cookbook. You can create a config file (as well as a build cookbook) using the Chef Automate CLI tool and the init subcommand: delivery init or delivery init --local.
trans-unit.target: 每个项目都在其源存储库中包含一个配置文件，该文件位于 .delivery/config.json ，该文件指定要用于该项目的构建食谱，而该构建食谱又包含控制管道阶段中发生情况的配方。配置文件还允许自定义Chef Automate和构建食谱的行为。您可以使用Chef Automate CLI工具和init子命令（ delivery init 或 delivery init --local ）创建配置文件（以及构建食谱）。

trans-unit.source: Each project has one (or more) pipelines. Each pipeline has a designated target branch into which it will merge approved changes. Chef Automate uses a “gated master” model that manages merges to the target branch. The typical setup is for each project to have a single pipeline that targets the master branch.
trans-unit.target: 每个项目都有一个（或多个）管道。每个管道都有一个指定的目标分支，它将合并已批准的更改。Chef Automate使用“门控主控”模型来管理到目标分支的合并。典型的设置是每个项目都有一个针对主分支的管道。

trans-unit.source: Each project has one or more pipelines. The typical setup is for each project to have a single pipeline that targets the master branch.
trans-unit.target: 每个项目都有一个或多个管道。典型的设置是每个项目都有一个以主分支为目标的单一流水线。

trans-unit.source: Each project pipeline has an associated Verify, Build and Acceptance stage. These are called acceptance pipelines
trans-unit.target: 每个项目流水线都有一个相关的验证、构建和验收阶段。这些阶段被称为验收流水线

trans-unit.source: Each request to the Chef Infra Server from those executables sign a special group of HTTP headers with the private key. The Chef Infra Server then uses the public key to verify the headers and verify the contents.
trans-unit.target: 这些可执行文件对Chef Infra服务器的每个请求都会用私钥签署一组特殊的HTTP头文件。然后,Chef Infra服务器使用公钥来验证头文件并验证其内容。

trans-unit.source: Each request to the Chef server from those executables sign a special group of HTTP headers with the private key. The Chef server then uses the public key to verify the headers and verify the contents.
trans-unit.target: 这些可执行文件向Chef服务器发出的每个请求都会用私钥签署一组特殊的HTTP头文件。然后,Chef服务器使用公钥来验证头文件,并验证其内容。

trans-unit.source: Each resource has different properties. See the resource documentation for details.
trans-unit.target: 每种资源都有不同的属性。有关详细信息，请参见资源文档。

trans-unit.source: Each row of the Service Groups table displays the results for an individual service group. The rows sort according to the highest criticality, meaning that the service groups reporting the lowest percentage of healthy services–and the highest percentage of “critical” services–appear at the top.
trans-unit.target: 服务组表的每一行都显示单个服务组的结果。这些行按最高关键程度排序，这意味着服务组报告的健康服务百分比最低，而“关键”服务百分比最高，出现在顶部。

trans-unit.source: Each rule describes a list of conditions, where each condition describes a single characteristic.
trans-unit.target: 每个规则描述一个条件列表，其中每个条件描述一个特征。

trans-unit.source: Each sandbox has a unique identifier. The /sandboxes/ID endpoint has the following methods: PUT.
trans-unit.target: 每个沙盒都有一个唯一的标识符。的 /sandboxes/ID 端点具有以下方法： PUT 。

trans-unit.source: Each stage consists of phases that perform a particular task, such as running some type of test.
trans-unit.target: 每个阶段由执行特定任务的阶段组成,如运行某种类型的测试。

trans-unit.source: Each subcommand has its own set of arguments and options.
trans-unit.target: 每个子命令都有自己的一组参数和选项。

trans-unit.source: Each tab has a matching panel which is created with foundation_tabs_panel shortcodes. The Markdown text that is displayed in each panel must be contained in opening and closing foundation_tabs_panel shortcodes.
trans-unit.target: 每个选项卡都有一个匹配的面板，该面板使用 foundation_tabs_panel 短代码创建。每个面板中显示的Markdown文本必须包含在打开和关闭 foundation_tabs_panel 短代码中。

trans-unit.source: Each tab is created with a foundation_tab shortcode. Use as many foundation_tab shortcodes as you need to display the number of code blocks or text blocks that you want the user to be able click on and reveal.
trans-unit.target: 每个选项卡均使用 foundation_tab 短代码创建。根据需要，使用尽可能多的 foundation_tab 短代码来显示希望用户能够单击并显示的代码块或文本块的数量。

trans-unit.source: Each time a user adds one or more nodes manually or with a node integration (AWS, Azure, or GCP), Chef Automate runs aninspec detect job on the newly added node(s). If the detect job is successful, the node status updates from ‘unknown’ to ‘reachable’, and the platform information is updated from the inspec detect results. If the detect job is unsuccessful, meaning the node could not be reached, the node’s status updates to ‘unreachable’. The status updates every time a scan job runs on the node.
trans-unit.target: 每次用户手动添加一个或多个节点或通过节点集成（AWS，Azure或GCP）添加一个或多个节点时，Chef Automate都会在新添加的节点上运行 inspec detect 作业。如果检测作业成功，则节点状态将从“未知”更新为“可达”，并且平台信息将从 inspec detect 结果更新。如果检测作业失败，则意味着无法访问该节点，该节点的状态将更新为“无法访问”。每次在节点上运行扫描作业时，状态都会更新。

trans-unit.source: Each workstation stores its private key in the chef-repo. This private key is generated by the Chef Infra Server and must be download from the server and copied to the .chef directory in the chef-repo. If a new private key is required, simply regenerate it from the Chef Infra Server and re-copy it to the chef-repo.
trans-unit.target: 每个工作站将其私钥存储在chef-repo中。此私钥由Chef Infra服务器生成，必须从服务器下载并复制到Chef-repo中的 .chef 目录。如果需要新的私钥，只需从Chef Infra Server重新生成它，然后将其重新复制到Chef-repo。

trans-unit.source: Effortless Audit is the pattern for managing your Chef InSpec profiles. It uses Chef Habitat and Chef InSpec to build an artifact that contains your profiles and its dependencies alongside the scripts necessary to run them on your systems.
trans-unit.target: 轻松审核是用于管理Chef InSpec配置文件的模式。它使用Chef Habitat和Chef InSpec构建一个工件，其中包含您的配置文件及其相关性以及在系统上运行它们所需的脚本。

trans-unit.source: Effortless Config is the pattern for managing your Chef Infra workloads. It uses Chef Habitat and Chef Policyfiles to build an artifact that contains the cookbooks and their dependencies alongside the scripts necessary to run them on your systems.
trans-unit.target: 轻松配置是管理Chef Infra工作负载的模式。它使用Chef Habitat和Chef Policyfiles构建一个工件，其中包含菜谱及其依赖关系以及在系统上运行它们所必需的脚本。

trans-unit.source: Effortless does not support situations that require a Chef Infra Server. For example, if you use search in your cookbooks, or use chef vault for secrets management, then Effortless will not work for those cookbooks
trans-unit.target: 不费力气不支持需要Chef Infra Server的情况。例如，如果您在食谱中使用搜索，或使用 chef vault 进行秘密管理，则“轻松工作”将不适用于这些食谱
